thread.title: Media sale puts Turkish press on Erdogan's side

title: Media sale puts Turkish press on Erdogan's side
text:
Media sale puts Turkish press on Erdogan's side Friday, March 23, 2018 - 02:19 
Turkey's Dogan Holding confirmed on Thursday it had started talks to sell its $890 million media arm to an unlisted firm seen as close to Tayyip Erdogan, a deal likely to cement media support for the president ahead of 2019 elections. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
